sentences: Hekiru Shiina (椎名 へきる, Shiina Hekiru, born March 12, 1974 as Makiko Shiina (椎名 牧子, Shiina Makiko)) is a Japanese voice actress and singer from Tokyo, Japan.
Her first voice role was Tenshiko in K.O. Beast in 1992.

Shiina was previously associated with Arts Vision, a major agency for talent in Tokyo, and was working under Sony Music Records, her record label until 2009, when she changed over to Lantis and later Warner Music Japan.
She moved from Arts Vision to Voice Kit in February 2021.
